Question.Subject: site that pays you to refer webcam models?
Question.Content: Do you know any site that pays you (and how much per sign up) to find webcam models?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Go to the site below and click "become an agent" I think they allow you to do it.
http://www.internetmodeling.com/1278/become_an_agent.htm
Try placing some ads on classifieds sites like craigslist.etc

Answer.Content:
Go to the site below and click "become an agent" I think they allow you to do it.
http://www.internetmodeling.com/1278/become_an_agent.htm
Try placing some ads on classifieds sites like craigslist.etc

The link that Jason gave you pays an ongoing commission of 10% of what the model earns. You continue to earn that commission as long as the model is working.
livejasmin also pays you to signup models, but I stopped recruiting for them, because they reduce your commission every couple of months and after they model has been with them for a year they stop paying you. They don't tell you that upfront though, they just tell you that you get a 36% commission.
